title: Ghazanchetsots Cathedral
summary: Holy Savior Cathedral (Armenian: Սուրբ Ամենափրկիչ մայր տաճար, Surb Amenap′rkich mayr tachar), commonly referred to as Ghazanchetsots (Armenian: Ղազանչեցոց),[lower-alpha 1] is an Armenian Apostolic cathedral in Shusha (known to Armenians as Shushi) in Azerbaijan. It is the cathedra of the Diocese of Artsakh of the Armenian Apostolic Church.
